item.title: Welcome to The Grid Beta!
item.description:
Welcome to The Grid Beta! 

Here you will find inspirations and a showcase of beta sites from The Founding Members of The Grid.

item.title: Chairs
item.description:
Chairs

Design: 1985 - 1958Production: 1988 - 1990 Manufacturer: Pod, SydneySize: 86 x 166 x 57 cmsMaterial: fiberglass, riveted sheet Aluminum The Australian designer Marc Newson has enjoyed international acclaim since 1985. The origins of his works are often associated with Sydney, his native city, where the sea is omnipresent, and with his hobby of surfing.

item.title: Streetshots
item.description:
Streetshots

The great wall, Lima street Photography by Ivan Schuler "justoneartist" - Canon 6d - 1/400th - f8 - 24mm - ISO 125 - Tamron AF 24-70mm f/2.8 SP Di USD VC -

item.title: Motion
item.description:
Motion

Territory is a boutique creative studio specialising in motion, digital and graphic design. We work across a diverse range of sectors delivering creative solutions for brands large and small.

item.title: ɅUGMΞNTL
item.description:
ɅUGMΞNTL

We recently demoed The Climb, a new virtual reality game from Crytek. At our demo session, we had the opportunity to chat with Jason Rubin, the Head of Worldwide Studios at Oculus, about his role in working with developers to make great virtual reality games for the launch of the Oculus Rift.

item.title: VisualEyesMedia
item.description:
VisualEyesMedia

Visual Eyes Media, is a London based architectural visualisation company; producing high quality graphic solutions for all sectors of the architectural and building development community. We produce visual media that presents our client's schemes in the best possible light; adding tangible value to interactive presentations, planning submissions and marketing literature.

item.title: Beautifuloutcome
item.description:
Beautifuloutcome

We, Jeffrey and Julia Woods have owned our own photography business for over 20 years. In that time we have photographed weddings, portraits, commercial, as well as educating photographers around the world. Much of that education centered around helping photographers to keep their family first while balancing the demands of their business.

item.title: MyOtherCamera.is
item.description:
MyOtherCamera.is

The best camera is the one that is always with you.

item.title: Press
item.description:
Press

The most exciting entrepreneurs today are changing the way we will live in the future. Together with the team at Social Media Week, Entrepreneur has picked ten startups that are re-engineering the ways in which humans interact with the Internet.

item.title: Joseph Jewell Wines
item.description:
Joseph Jewell Wines

This Joseph Jewell Pinot is joyous in fresh berry fruit aromas and flavors, from wild strawberry to taut cherry, the fruit buoyed by lush, velvety tannins and generous acidity. Pretty on the nose and tongue, it discloses a trace of vanilla on the clean, distinct finish...Buy this wine
